Profile

I am a full-stack web developer with over 20 years experience across a diverse landscape of industries and proficiencies in many web technologies & frameworks including front-end (HTML/CSS/SCSS/JS), React, and the LAMP stack. I’m able to lead a project from conception through deployment, and I enjoy learning new skills and solving problems.

Experience

  • Software Engineer II, Memorial Sloan Kettering Cancer Center, New York, NY; 2021–Present

    • Maintain front-end codebase (Twig and React) for entire public-facing mskcc.org website within our design system
    • Help architect and develop new front-end components
    • Coordinate transition to new design system across multiple environments and code-bases
    • Guide and mentor junior developers through pair-programming and peer code reviews

  • Independent Contractor, RHM Interactive, Montclair, NJ; 2010–Present

    • Designed and developed WordPress and static websites for small- & medium-sized businesses
    • Contracted full-stack development services to other agencies for clients such as Cabela’s, Panasonic, Heineken USA, and Martha Stewart Living Omnimedia

  • Sr. Developer, Paper Tiger Design, Ridgewood, NJ; 2019–2020

    • Developed PHP-based integrations with WordPress and CraftCMS systems
    • Customized CMS for client needs based on content and editorial requirements

  • Full-Stack Developer, Addison Design, New York, NY; 2017–2018

    • Developed client- and server-side for numerous WordPress sites, including custom themes and plugins
    • Developed static financial reporting sites for several clients

  • HTML Team Lead, Martha Stweart Living Omnimedia, New York, NY; 2008–2010

    • Led front-end architecture for all MSLO web properties
    • Launched front-end re-design of MS Weddings online
    • Mentored teammates, providing guidance & feedback through code reviews

  • Front-End Architect, Ogilvy & Mather, New York, NY; 2008

    • Developed front-end code for client & brand micro-sites
    • Re-architected client sites to use web standards

  • Sr. Interface Developer, Fry, Inc., New York, NY; 2006–2008

    • Developed & integrated front-end code for client e-commerce sites
    • Led front-end development for several redesign & rebranding efforts
    • Oversaw ADA-compliance initiatives for the Fry NYC office

  • Sr. IT Professional, University of Vermont, Burlington, VT; 2001–2006

    • Developed numerous Flash-based games, simulations, and lab activities
    • Led front-end & back-end development on several campus website initiatives
